bug.author: langwei
bug.summary: Check failed: err == cudaSuccess (8 vs. 0) Name: MapPlanKernel ErrStr:invalid device function
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Environment info</denchmark-h>
Operating System: Ubuntu 16.04 ï¼ŒTX1 MXNet version: 0.10.1 Python version and distribution:Python 2.7 <denchmark-h:h2>Error Message:</denchmark-h>
tx1@tegra-ubuntu:~/git/mxnet/example/image-classification$ **python train_ mnist.py --gpus 0 --network lenet INFO:root:start with arguments Namespace(batch_size=64, disp_batches=100, gpus='0', kv_store='device', load_epoch=None, lr=0.05, lr_factor=0.1, lr_step_epochs='10', model_prefix=None, mom=0.9, monitor=0, network='lenet', num_classes=10, num_epochs=20, num_examples=60000, num_layers=None, optimizer='sgd', test_io=0, top_k=0, wd=0.0001) [02:42:41] /home/tx1/git/mxnet/dmlc-core/include/dmlc/./logging.h:304: [02:42:41] comments.comment: Did you compile from source? Try adding 53 to KNOWN_CUDA_ARCHS in Makefile and compiling.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ptrendx>@ptrendx</denchmark-link> Yes, I compile from source, and I have add 53 in the Makefile ,but it still appears the problem.
I also have same issue for TX1. I've added 53 too, but still same.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wangmir>@wangmir</denchmark-link> hello, did you solved the problem?
No I didn't. I'm also in same stage with you.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/langwei>@langwei</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wangmir>@wangmir</denchmark-link> Did you solve this issue? I met this same error.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/orgs/apache/teams/mxnet-committers>@apache/mxnet-committers</denchmark-link> : This issue has been inactive for the past 90 days. It has no label and needs triage. For general "how-to" questions, our <denchmark-link:https://discuss.mxnet.io/>user forum</denchmark-link> (and <denchmark-link:https://discuss.gluon.ai/>Chinese version</denchmark-link> ) is a good place to get help.

Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/langwei>@langwei</denchmark-link>
Were you able to resolve the issue following the steps above?

Hello @langwei Were you able to resolve the issue following the steps above? Try adding " CUDA_ARCH = -m64 -gencode arch=computer_53 , code = sm_53 -gencode arch = computer_53, code=computer_53" to KNOWN_CUDA_ARCHS in Makefile and compiling.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/langwei>@langwei</denchmark-link> could you please elaborate more? If the issue was resolved then could you please close it?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/langwei>@langwei</denchmark-link> requesting an update on your comment above, has the issue been resolved?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/langwei>@langwei</denchmark-link> bouncing again for an update as asked in Nov 2018. If this is no longer an issue, please close. Thanks!
